0.1.name: wordpress/blippr-reviews
0.1.description:
This plugin allows your users to use Blippr reviews directly from your blog like Mashable does. Simply add the tag [blippr] to your posts to add an hot word that will be used to generate Blippr tooltip.

This plugins makes heavy use of Blippr APIs and Js and all credits go directly to their great developers.

This plugin is not an official release from Blippr staff, just a contribute from a fan.
